forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 35, with temperatures rising to around 37 overnight. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain between 7pm and 10pm, then rain and snow likely. Cloudy, with a low around 34. Northeast wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.
